From Erika Costa <ecosta@convivasolutions.com>: I sent detail Irita
Sent with BlackBerry Work (www.blackberry.com)
From: Irita Noalla <inoalla@convivasolutions.com<mailto:inoalla@convivasolutions.com>> Date: Friday, Nov 01, 2019, 11:41 AM To: Ada Allegue <aallegue@convivasolutions.com<mailto:aallegue@convivasolutions.com>>, Erika Costa <ecosta@convivasolutions.com<mailto:ecosta@convivasolutions.com>>, Maily Gutierrez <maily.gutierrez@convivasolutions.com<mailto:maily.gutierrez@convivasolutions.com>>, Phone Support <phonesupport@convivasolutions.com<mailto:phonesupport@convivasolutions.com>>, Carlos Rodriguez <crodriguez@convivasolutions.com<mailto:crodriguez@convivasolutions.com>> Subject: RE: Phones
Please Palm Springs continue with pharmacy problems the new phones are in Ada allegue offices, referral dep continue with front desks no connections we need help we waiting for about 2wks we are in open enrollment patients are complaining about phones services.
Irita Noalla Administrator 440 West 49 Street Hialeah, FL 33012 T:305.828.5000 / F:305.828.5007 Inoalla@convivasolutions.com
From: Ada Allegue <aallegue@convivasolutions.com<mailto:aallegue@convivasolutions.com>> Date: Friday, Nov 01, 2019, 9:50 AM To: Irita Noalla <inoalla@convivasolutions.com<mailto:inoalla@convivasolutions.com>>, Erika Costa <ecosta@convivasolutions.com<mailto:ecosta@convivasolutions.com>>, Maily Gutierrez <maily.gutierrez@convivasolutions.com<mailto:maily.gutierrez@convivasolutions.com>>, Phone Support <phonesupport@convivasolutions.com<mailto:phonesupport@convivasolutions.com>> Subject: Re: Phones
?
?Good Morning
Irita the phones is ok to transfer the call to the Pharmacy. Mayra Rivero she already have the panel programed.
Referrals front desk Yaritza and Teresa ext.1011 and 1005 still the same don't received any calls from outside. Room computers for Dr. Gutierrez still the same nothing happen. The Optical dept.still the same they don't receive any call .
Let'me know if I put another ticket because this are the same from the other day
Thank You
Ada Allegue
Assistant Administrator

________________________________ From: Irita Noalla Sent: Friday, November 1, 2019 6:59 AM To: Ada Allegue; Barbara Colon; Erika Costa Subject:
Good morning,Please check all phones are working properly. 1pharmacy the phones connected and our operators can be transfer calls 2 referrals front desks working receiving calls Yarisa and Teresa 3 switch operator Mayra Rivero missing phone Ext names and to be program If I missing something please add this for IT conviva somebody have to visit the center,call them and email we put 3 tickets to support and nothing happens please Barbie if Ada is busy get this done please, thank you Call you later for updates Adrian is working with Dr Gutierrez computers is datalink or IT hardware.yesterday update was waiting for them please need adrian response thank you again.
Irita Noalla Administrator 440 West 49 Street Hialeah, FL 33012 T:305.828.5000 / F:305.828.5007 Inoalla@convivasolutions.com
